name: Bad Thoughts (itch) (Jay)
description:
WAVE-BASED FIRST-PERSON SHOOTER

Fight off your negative thoughts and become a better person!

Waves spawn *every 10 seconds* and you only have a Handgun to defend yourself.

Survive as long as you can!

Controls:

WASD : Move

Mouse : Look

Shift : Sprint

Right Click : Aim

Left Click : Shoot

Tools Used:
  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Materialize
  • Photoshop
  • Cubase 10.5
  • FL Studio
Reflection:

Besides the FPS Controller & Weapon model, which were made in advance, all Code and Assets were made for the Jam.

All Sound Effects & Music were also created during the three days, including a whole bunch of foley used throughout the Soundscape.

We are only a two-man team, with one focusing on practical Development and the other on Project Management.

We worked really hard on this, so please let us know what you think!
